remarks: Lemma for arithmetic diophantine sets.  Reuse a polynomial expression under a new quantifier.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 10-Oct-2014.)
statement:
rabdiophlem2.1 $e |- M = ( N + 1 ) $.
rabdiophlem2 $p |- ( ( N e. NN0 /\ ( u e. ( ZZ ^m ( 1 ... N ) ) |-> A ) e. ( mzPoly ` ( 1 ... N ) ) ) -> ( t e. ( ZZ ^m ( 1 ... M ) ) |-> [_ ( t |` ( 1 ... N ) ) / u ]_ A ) e. ( mzPoly ` ( 1 ... M ) ) ) $.
$d A t $.
$d M t u $.
$d N t u $.
